bibl.title: Local Epigraphic Habit and the Genesis of Monumental Inscriptions in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Presents three 'monumental' inscriptions: I. Hermoupolis 1; - O.G.I.S. I, 94 [= I. Akoris 1]; - S.E.G. XXXVII 1622 [= I. Akoris 3, reign of Domitian], rediscovered in 2003 during Japanese investigations at the quarry in the rocky desert to the northeast of the site.
